item.title: GVIM Settings on Windows
item.description: Copy the vimrc from devenv git repo to Windows home directory, name it _gvimrc The reason to give the name _gvimrc is to avoid the vim in git bash to load it. This would let the vim in git bash lighter and faster. Run below commands in git bash (copied from all_set.sh of devenv) 1 2 3 4 5 6 mkdir -p ~/.vim/autoload ~/.vim/bundle ~/.vim/colors \ && git clone -q https://github.
